controllers.frontend

Class CoverflowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.frontend.CoverflowLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameNavigationLayout, CoverflowListDataSource

    public class CoverflowLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameNavigationLayout, CoverflowListDataSource
    Presents the game catalog with a 'coverflow' style.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie
